com.flipp.flyerkit

Interface FlyerView.FlyerViewListener

  • Enclosing class:
    FlyerView

    public static interface FlyerView.FlyerViewListener
    Interface definition for a callback handler to be invoked upon flyer view events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDoubleTap(FlyerView flyerView, FlyerView.TapAnnotation annotation, int x, int y)
      Called when an annotation created with FlyerView.setTapAnnotations(java.util.List) is double tapped.
      void onFlyerLoaded(FlyerView flyerView)
      Called when the flyer view successfully loads the flyer id set by FlyerView.setFlyerId(int, String, String, String);
      void onFlyerLoadError(FlyerView flyerView, java.lang.Exception e)
      Called when the flyer view fails to load the flyer id set by FlyerView.setFlyerId(int, String, String, String).
      void onFlyerLoading(FlyerView flyerView)
      Called when the flyer view begins loading the flyer id set by FlyerView.setFlyerId(int, String, String, String);
      void onLongPress(FlyerView flyerView, FlyerView.TapAnnotation annotation, int x, int y)
      Called when an annotation created with FlyerView.setTapAnnotations(java.util.List) is long pressed.
      void onScroll(FlyerView flyerView)
      Called when the flyer view's visible rectangle has changed.
      void onSingleTap(FlyerView flyerView, FlyerView.TapAnnotation annotation, int x, int y)
      Called when an annotation created with FlyerView.setTapAnnotations(java.util.List) is single tapped.

    • Method Detail

      • onSingleTap

        void onSingleTap(FlyerView flyerView,
                 FlyerView.TapAnnotation annotation,
                 int x,
                 int y)
        Called when an annotation created with FlyerView.setTapAnnotations(java.util.List) is single tapped.
        Parameters:
        flyerView - The view that was single tapped.
        annotation - The tap annotation that was single tapped, or null.
        x - The x coordinate in flyer coordinates of the single tap.
        y - The y coordinate in flyer coordinates of the single tap.

      • onDoubleTap

        void onDoubleTap(FlyerView flyerView,
                 FlyerView.TapAnnotation annotation,
                 int x,
                 int y)
        Called when an annotation created with FlyerView.setTapAnnotations(java.util.List) is double tapped.
        Parameters:
        flyerView - The view that was double tapped.
        annotation - The tap annotation that was double tapped, or null.
        x - The x coordinate in flyer coordinates of the double tap.
        y - The y coordinate in flyer coordinates of the double tap.

      • onLongPress

        void onLongPress(FlyerView flyerView,
                 FlyerView.TapAnnotation annotation,
                 int x,
                 int y)
        Called when an annotation created with FlyerView.setTapAnnotations(java.util.List) is long pressed.
        Parameters:
        flyerView - The view that was long pressed.
        annotation - The tap annotation that was long pressed, or null.
        x - The x coordinate in flyer coordinates of the long press.
        y - The y coordinate in flyer coordinates of the long press.

      • onScroll

        void onScroll(FlyerView flyerView)
        Called when the flyer view's visible rectangle has changed.
        Parameters:
        flyerView - The view that scrolled.

      • onFlyerLoading

        void onFlyerLoading(FlyerView flyerView)
        Called when the flyer view begins loading the flyer id set by FlyerView.setFlyerId(int, String, String, String);
        Parameters:
        flyerView - The view that began loading.

      • onFlyerLoaded

        void onFlyerLoaded(FlyerView flyerView)
        Called when the flyer view successfully loads the flyer id set by FlyerView.setFlyerId(int, String, String, String);
        Parameters:
        flyerView - The view that successfully finished loading.

      • onFlyerLoadError

        void onFlyerLoadError(FlyerView flyerView,
                      java.lang.Exception e)
        Called when the flyer view fails to load the flyer id set by FlyerView.setFlyerId(int, String, String, String).
        Parameters:
        flyerView - The view that failed to load.
        e - The error that occurred while loading, or null.
